text: 亚历山大 is the name “Alexander”. Find out more about Alexander in today’s Chinese reading article!我的名字是亚历山大，我二十岁。我的家里有四口人。我的爸爸是一位生意人。他喜欢他的工作。我的妈妈是一位护士。她不喜欢她的工作。我的哥哥和我都上大学。My name is Alexander, I am twenty years old. There are four people in my family.My father is a businessman. He likes his work.My mother is a nurse. She doesn’t like her job.My brother and I both go to college.1 – 他家里有几口人？a. 他家里有三口人b. 他家里有四口人。c. 他家里有六口人。d. 他家里有七口人。2 – 亚历山大的爸爸喜欢他的工作吗？a. 喜欢b. 不喜欢1. b2. aReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
